item.title: MapStruct and Quarkus - a match made in heaven?
item.description:
This year is nearly over, but it was started with something new that came up in the Java world: Quarkus. You may already have heard about it, if not, donâ€™t worry, I will quickly summarize what it is.

Additionally to this post you can also find a working example in our examples repository.
